Source: The US government report on Namibia 's human rights practices for 2001
Target: members of the security forces committed several extra-judicial killings during security operations in the Kavango and Caprivi Regions during 2001

text: The US government report on Namibia 's human rights practices for 2001 , released this week , says members of the security forces committed several extra-judicial killings during security operations in the Kavango and Caprivi Regions during 2001 .
